short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the continued provision of maintenance and support services for the ULTools application.
description: The maintenance and support services include maintenance releases, software error correction, software documentation, the software and support services (e.g., help desk support) for the duration of the contracted support period. \\n\\nDocuments may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Systems Integration Design (Solicitation Number: W8485-TBIPS2024-06)
#### Date of Publication: May 22, 2024, | Closing Date: June 21, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT


The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of systems integration design services under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement. This requirement is only open to pre-qualified suppliers who have met the necessary security, expertise, and experience requirements.



### Scope of Work:
The successful contractor will be required to provide systems integration design services for a period of 24 months, with an option for a 6-month extension. The services include the design, development, and maintenance of systems integration solutions, as well as the provision of technical support and documentation.



### Requirement Specifications:
-	19 months contract duration, plus a 6-month option period for extension
-	Security Level: Secret
-	Number of contracts: One (1) contract for the designated services
-	Location of Work: National Capital Region, with primary location at 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC
-	Estimated Level of Effort: 240 days per year



### Contact Information:
For any inquiries regarding this RFP requirement, please contact:
-	Point of Contact (POC): Khan Check
-	E-Mail: DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca



### Business Opportunity:
The successful contractor will have the opportunity to work with the Department of National Defence (DND) to design and implement systems integration solutions, supporting the provision of critical defence services.



### Evaluation Criteria:
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

-	Technical Merit (60%)
-	Price (40%)



### Pre-Qualified Suppliers:
This requirement is open only to the following pre-qualified suppliers who have met the necessary security, expertise, and experience requirements:

-	See list of pre-qualified suppliers below (127 suppliers)



Please note that all communication regarding this RFP shall be addressed to the designated Point of Contact (POC).



### Important Dates:


Deadline for submissions of proposal: June 21, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT



Submission of proposals must be sent electronically to the POC. It is the responsibility of the supplier to ensure that their proposal is submitted on time and
